text: (he nabee!) jo baiat kar rahe hain aapase, ve vaastav[1] mein baiat kar rahe hain allaah se. allaah ka haath unake haathon ke oopar hai. phir jisane vachan toda, to vah apane oopar hee vachan todega tatha jisane poora kiya jo vachan allaah se kiya hai, to vah use bada pratiphal (badala) pradaan karega
